name: Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 1 - We Negotiate with Terrorists
name_original: Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 1 - We Negotiate with Terrorists
description:
Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 1 - We Negotiate with Terrorists is an adventure game developed by Straandlooper Animation. It was originally released in 2011. Telltale Games published the game.
You can play Hector: Badge of Carnage! Episode 1 - We Negotiate with Terrorists on PC.
